languages.text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас обжигающий взгляд. Его губа чуть дергается, словно ваш ответ нарушил какие-то его планы.{/n} "Как скажешь, {name}. Как скажешь".
{n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай бросает на вас обжигающий взгляд. Его губа чуть дергается, словно ваш ответ нарушил какие-то его планы.{/n} "Как скажешь, {name}. Как скажешь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."
{n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."
{n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."
{n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋瞪着你，微微翘起了嘴唇，仿佛你的答复从某方面破坏了他原本的计划。{/n}“如你所愿，{name}。如你所愿。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋瞪着你，微微翘起了嘴唇，仿佛你的答复从某方面破坏了他原本的计划。{/n}“如你所愿，{name}。如你所愿。”

languages.text: {n}あなたの反応が何か計画を踏み躙ったとでも言うように、マラズハイは少し口を歪めてこちらを睨みつけた。{/n}「仰せのままに、{name}。言う事は聞くさ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの反応が何か計画を踏み躙ったとでも言うように、マラズハイは少し口を歪めてこちらを睨みつけた。{/n}「仰せのままに、{name}。言う事は聞くさ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te mira fijamente y arquea el labio, como si tu respuesta le hubiera chafado los planes de algún modo.{/n} «Como desees, {name}. Como desees».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te mira fijamente y arquea el labio, como si tu respuesta le hubiera chafado los planes de algún modo.{/n} «Como desees, {name}. Como desees».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous foudroie du regard, les lèvres légèrement retroussées, comme si votre réponse avait pour ainsi dire contrarié ses projets.{/n} « Comme vous voudrez, {name}. Comme vous voudrez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous foudroie du regard, les lèvres légèrement retroussées, comme si votre réponse avait pour ainsi dire contrarié ses projets.{/n} « Comme vous voudrez, {name}. Comme vous voudrez. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai starrt dich an und seine Lippen kräuseln sich leicht, als ob deine Reaktion irgendwie einen Strich durch seine Pläne gemacht hätte.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht, {name}. Wie Ihr wünscht."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai starrt dich an und seine Lippen kräuseln sich leicht, als ob deine Reaktion irgendwie einen Strich durch seine Pläne gemacht hätte.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht, {name}. Wie Ihr wünscht."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana bakıyor. Cevabın bir şekilde planlarını bozmuşçasına dudağı hafifçe bükülüyor.{/n} "Nasıl arzu edersen {name}. Nasıl arzu edersen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai glares at you, his lip curling slightly, as though your response has spoiled his plans in some way.{/n} "As you wish, {name}. As you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sana bakıyor. Cevabın bir şekilde planlarını bozmuşçasına dudağı hafifçe bükülüyor.{/n} "Nasıl arzu edersen {name}. Nasıl arzu edersen."
